divs: Sighting DetailsHe says to look for the dark teardrop shape near the sun... BUT WHAT about those four lights in a straight line that are between the sun and the large red spot in the photo. Zoom in on those 4 lights and you will see what I am referring to. That looks more like a UFO to me than the teardrop which could be a bug on the lense. CHECK OUT THE 4 LIGHTS that form a LINE. Also you listed as 2010 but the Google photo is stamped 2008. Just wanted to make a note of that for you. I assume 9am by position of sun in sky.
Summary: Reply to: 2010-07-16 Check GOOGLE MAPS for Mona St, Oxbow, SK - look near the sun - teardrop shaped UFO.
